data.title: Previous Seasons – Prometheus Symphony Orchestra
data.text:
Listen to Our Concerts

Click on the work or the “mp3” after it to listen. Links are also downloadable.

PSO Repertoire 1965 onward

You can see the works Prometheus Symphony Orchestra has performed in its history HERE

2023-24 Season

• First Concert: SATURDAY, September 30, 2023 – See the concert HERE (YouTube)

Robert Schumann • Overture, Scherzo, and Finale

Hector Berlioz • Overture to Benvenuto Cellini

Cécile Chaminade • Callirhoë Suite

Women Composer Series

• Second Concert: Sunday, November 19, 2023 – See the Concert HERE (YouTube)

Ludwig van Beethoven • Symphony No. 8 in F Major

Claude Debussy • Prélude à l’après-midi d’un faune

Leoš Janáček • Lašské Tance (Lachian Dances)

• Third Concert: Sunday, January 28, 2024 – See the Concert HERE (YouTube) George Gershwin • An American in Paris

Aaron Copland • Quiet City

Terri Knight, English Horn; John Maga, Trumpet

Ludwig van Beethoven • Beethoven Violin Concerto in D Major, Op.61

Dustin Breshears, Violin

Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition Co-Winner

• Fourth Concert: Saturday, March 23, 2024 – See the Concert HERE (YouTube) Carl Nielsen • Symphony No. 3 “Sinfonia Espansiva”

Raeeka Shehabi-Yaghmi, Soprano soloist

Z Hansen, Baritone soloist

Benjamin Britten • Quatre Chansons Françaises

Raeeka Shehabi-Yaghmi, Soprano soloist

• Fifth Concert: Sunday, May 19, 2024 – See the Concert HERE (YouTube) Pyotr Tchaikovsky • Symphony in Eb Major

Edward Elgar • Cello Concerto in E Minor, Op.85

Cara Wang, Cello

Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition Co-Winner

2022-23 Season

First Concert: SATURDAY, October 1, 2022 Antonin Dvořák • Symphony No. 9, Opus 95, “From the New World”

Giuseppi Verdi • Nabucco Sinfonia

Libby Larsen • Deep Summer Music

Women Composer Series

Second Concert: Sunday, November 20, 2022 – See the concert HERE (Youtube)

Robert Schumann • Symphony No. 4 –

Hector Berlioz • Les Nuits d’Ete (Summer Nights) –

Raeeka Shehabi-Yaghmai, Sopranorano

Third Concert: Sunday, January 29, 2023 – See the concert HERE

Aleksandr Borodin • Symphony No. 2 in B Minor

Gustav Mahler • Blumine

Alexander Glazunov • Violin Concerto in A Minor, Op. 82

Hiro Yoshimura, Violin soloist

Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition Winner

Fourth Concert: Saturday, March 25, 2023

Louis Moreau Gottschalk • Symphonie Romantique – La Nuit des Tropiques (A Night in the Tropics)

Igor Stravinsky • Le sacre du Printemps (The Rite of Spring)Spring)

Fifth Concert: Sunday, May 21, 2023 –

Modest Mussorgsky • Pictures at an Exhibition (Orchestrated by Ravel)

Sergey Prokofiev • Violin Concerto No. 2 in G Minor, Op. 63

Ava Pakiam, Violin soloist

Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition Winner

2021-22 Season

First Concert: Saturday, October 2, 2021 – video link

Franz Joseph Haydn • Symphony No. 99 in Eb Major

Hector Berlioz • Overture des “Les Francs-juges”

Sergei Prokofiev • Summer Night Suite, Op. 123

Second Concert: Sunday, November 21, 2021 – video link

Georg Philipp Telemann • Concerto for Three Trumpets, Two Oboes, and Timpani – video link

Edward Elgar • In the South – video link

Richard Strauss • Four Songs, Op. 27 – video link

Raeeka Shehabi-Yaghmai, Soprano

Third Concert: Sunday, January 30, 2022 – video link

Claude Debussy • La Mer

Johannes Brahms • Double Concerto for Violin & Cello

Valery and Starla Breshears (violin and cello)

Co-Winners Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition

Fourth Concert: Sunday, March 27, 2022 – video link Carl Nielsen • Symphony No. 5

Lili Boulanger • D’un matin de printemps

Women Composer Series

Boris Papandopulo • Concerto for Xylophone and String Orchestra

Francis Chua, xylophone

Winner Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition

Fifth Concert: Sunday, May 22, 2022 – Concert Flyer (PDF Download)

Ludwig van Beethoven • Symphony No. 3 in Eb Major “Eroica”

Richard Strauss • Salome – Dance of the Seven Veils

2019-20 Season

First Concert: Sunday, September 29, 2019

Antonin Dvořák · Symphony No. 8 in G Major, Op. 88 Mvt-I Mvt-II Mvt-III Mvt-IV

Hugo Alfvén · Midsommarvaka “Swedish Rhapsody” (mp3)

Second Concert: Sunday, November 17, 2019

Robert Schumann – Symphony No. 3 in Eb Major Op. 97 “Rhenish” Mvt-I Mvt-II Mvt-III Mvt-IV Mvt-V

Maurice Ravel · Boléro (mp3)

Julia Perry · A Short Piece for Large Orchestra (mp3)

*The performance of the Perry is part of Prometheus Symphony Orchestra’s Women Composers series,

which seeks to promote discovery of new favorites in classical music.

Third Concert: Sunday, January 26, 2020 Jean Sibelius • Symphony No. 5 in Eb Major, Op. 82

Carl Nielsen • Flute Concerto

Maya Stock, flute

Felix Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition Winner

Fourth and Fifth 2020 Concerts March and May 2020 were cancelled due COVID-19 Requirements

We hope to present the works planned for those concerts in the future

2018-19 Season

First Concert: Sunday, September 30, 2018 –

Georges Bizet · Symphony in C

Johannes Brahms · Variations on a Theme of Haydn, Op 56a

George Walker · Lyric for Strings (mp3)

Second Concert: Sunday, November 18, 2018

Florence Price* · The Oak (mp3)

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart – Symphony No. 38 in D Major “Prague” Mvt-1 Mvt-II Mvt-III

Joaquin Rodrígo · Concierto de Aranjuez Mvt-I Mvt-II Mvt-III

Jaume Torrent, Guitar soloist

*The performance of the Price is part of Prometheus Symphony Orchestra’s Women Composers series,

which seeks to promote discovery of new favorites in classical music.

Third Concert: Sunday, January 27, 2019

Anton Bruckner • Symphony No. 1 in C Minor (I-Allegro; II-Andagio; III-Scherzo; IV-Finale)

Sergei Prokofiev • Sinfonia concertante in E Minor, Opus 125 (I-Andante; II-Allegro giusto; III-Andante con moto)

Jacob Reed, cello

Co-Winner – Felix Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition

Fourth Concert: Sunday, March 24, 2019 –

Dmitri Shostakovich · Symphony No. 6 in B Minor, Op.54

Richard Wagner • Tristan und Isolde: Prelude and Liebestod

Raeeka Shehabi-Yaghmai, Soprano soloist

Fifth Concert: Sunday, May 19, 2019

Hector Berlioz · Overture to ‘Le Corsaire’

Johannes Brahms · Symphony No 2 in D Major , Op. 73

Pyotr Tchaikovsky · Variations on a Rococo Theme

Sarah Chong, cellist

Co-Winner 2018-19 Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition

2017-18 Season

First Concert: Sunday, October 1, 2017

Antonin Dvorak · Symphony No. 6 in D Major, Op. 60

Leos Janacek · “Fanfare” from Sinfonietta

Claude Debussy · Petite Suite

Second Concert: Sunday, November 19, 2017

Ludwig van Beethoven · Symphony No. 7 in A Major, Op. 92

Henry Purcell – Suite from “Abdelazer”

Louise Talma · Toccata for Orchestra (mp3) Intro (mp3)

This performance is part of Prometheus Symphony Orchestra’s Women Composers series,

which seeks to promote discovery of new favorites in classical music.

Third Concert: Sunday, January 28, 2018

Johannes Brahms · Symphony No. 3 in F Major, Op. 90

Dmitri Shostakovich · Cello Concerto No. 2

Davis You, Winner, Felix Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition Winner

Fourth Concert: Sunday, March 18, 2018

Pre-Concert talk (mp3)

Igor Stravinsky · Symphony In C (mp3) – Intro (mp3)

Vasily Kalinnikov · Symphony No. 1 in G Minor (mp3) – Intro (mp3)

Fifth Concert: Sunday, May 20, 2018

Pre-Concert talk (mp3)

Hector Berlioz · Symphonie fantastique, Op. 14

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart · Horn Concerto No. 2 in Eb Major, K. 417 (mp3)

Adrienne Chambers, Horn Soloist

2016-17 Season

First Concert: Sunday: September 25, 2016 –

Carl Maria von Weber · Overture to Der Freischütz (mp3)

Carl Maria von Weber · Invitation to the Dance (mp3)

Ludwig van Beethoven · Symphony No. 6 in F, Op. 68 (Pastoral) 1st Mvt; 2nd Mvt; 3rd & 4th Mvts

Second Season Concert: Sunday, November 20, 2016

Hector Berlioz · Grand Overture to “King Lear” (mp3)

Carl Neilsen · Symphony No. 4, Op. 29 (mp3)

Jean Sibelius · Violin Concerto, Op. 47 – 1st Mvt; 2nd Mvt; 3rd Mvt

Alexx Hinkle, violin

Third Season Concert: Sunday, January 29, 2017 –

Bedřich Smetana · Overture and Dances from the Bartered Bride – Overture(mp3); Dances(mp3)

Charles Ives: ·“The Circus Band” March (mp3)

Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky· Violin Concerto – 1st Mvt; 2nd Mvt; 3rd Mvt

Mai Matsumoto, violin, Khuner Concerto Competition Winner ·

Fourth Season Concert: Sunday, March 26, 2017

Igor Stravinsky · Symphony In Three Movements Mvt-1 Mvt-2&3

Vasily Kalinnikov · The Cedar and the Palm (mp3)

Elizabeth Maconchy· Two Dances from “Puck Fair” (mp3)

This performance is part of Prometheus Symphony Orchestra’s new Women Composers series, which seeks to promote discovery of new favorites in classical music.

Fifth Season Concert: Sunday, May 21, 2017

Giuseppi Verdi · Overture to “La Forza del Destino”

Johann Sebastian Bach · Recercar a 6 from “A Musical Offering”

Piotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky · Symphony No. 4, Op. 46

2015-2016 Season

First Concert: Sunday: September 27, 2015

William Grant Still · Danzas de Panama (mp3)

Franz Joseph Haydn · Symphony No. 103 in Eb Major “Drumroll” (mp3)

Antonín Dvořák · Symphonic Variations, Op. 78 (mp3)

Second Season Concert: Sunday, November 15, 2015

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart · Overture to “The Abduction from the Seraglio”, KV. 384 (mp3)

Antonín Dvořák · Carnival Overture, Op. 92 (mp3)

Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky · Suite No.3 in G Major, Op.55 – Audio(mp3): 1st Mvt 2nd Mvt 3rd Mvt 4th Mvt

Third Season Concert: Sunday, January 24, 2016

Richard Strauss · Till Eulenspiegels lustige Streiche, Op. 28 (mp3)

Aaron Copland · El Salón México (mp3)

Felix Mendelssohn · Violin Concerto, Op. 64 (mp3)

Andrew Lee, violin, Khuner Competition Winner

Fourth Season Concert: Sunday, March 20, 2016

Edmund Angerer · Kindersinfonie “Toy Symphony” (mp3)

Johannes Brahms · Symphony No. 1 in C Minor, Op. 68 – Audio(mp3): 1st Mvt 2nd Mvt 3rd Mvt 4th Mvt

Ives/Schuman · Variations on “America” (mp3)

Fifth Season Concert: Sunday, May 22, 2016

Gustav Mahler · Symphony No. 5 – Audio(mp3): 1st Mvt 2nd Mvt 3rd Mvt 4th Mvt 5th Mvt

2014-2015 Season

Sunday, May 17, 2015

Igor Stravinsky · Stravinsky_Greeting Prelude_x2

Ludwig van Beethoven · Symphony No. 9 “Choral” – Audio(mp3): Mvt 1-3 mp3 – 4th Mvt mp3

Sunday, March 22, 2015

Dmitri Shostakovich · Festive Overture – mp3

Gustav Mahler · Symphony No. 10 – mp3

Manuel de Falla · El Sombrero de tres picos – The Three-Cornered Hat, Suite 1 (mp3) – Suite 2 (mp3)

Sunday, January 25, 2015

Sergei Rachmaninoff · Symphonic Dances – mp3

Antonín Dvorák · Violin Concerto, Op. 53 – mp3

Charissa Leung, violin, Felix Khuner Young Artist Concerto Competition Winner

Sunday November 16, 2014

Leonard Bernstein · Symphonic Dances from “West Side Story” – mp3

Edvard Grieg · Two Elegiac Melodies – mp3

Piotr Ilych Tchaikovsky · Variations on a Rococo Theme – mp3

Oliver Herbert, violoncello

Sunday September 28, 2014

Claudio Monteverdi · Toccata e Ritornelli from “L’Orfeo” – mp3

Franz Joseph Haydn · Symphony No. 104 “London” – mp3

Piotr Ilych Tchaikovsky · Sleeping Beauty Suite – mp3

2013-2014 Season

Sunday May 18, 2014

Maurice Ravel · Rapsodie Espagnole – I Prelude.mp3; II Malaguena.mp3; III Habanera.mp3; IV Feria.mp3

Piotr Tchaikovsky · Symphony No. 5, Op. 64 – I Andante.mp3; II Andante cantabile.mp3; III Valse.mp3; IV Finale.mp3

Sunday March 23, 2014

Richard Strauss · Don Juan, Op.20 – mp3

Frederick Delius · Brigg Fair: An English Rhapsody – mp3

Carl Maria von Weber · Concertino in Eb for Clarinet and Orchestra, – mp3

Kelvin Guo, clarinet – Khuner Concerto Competition Winner

Sunday January 26, 2014

Aaron Copland · Appalachian Spring (Ballet for Martha) – mp3

Charles Ives · The Unanswered Question – mp3

Antonin Dvorak · Cello Concerto Op. 104 – mp3

Ila Shon, violoncello – Khuner Concerto Competition Winner

Sunday November 17, 2013

Hector Berlioz · Marche Troyenne from ‘Les Troyens’ – mp3

Antonín Dvorák · Scherzo Capriccioso, Op.66 – mp3

Robert Schumann · Symphony No.2 in C Major, Op.61 – mp3

Sunday September 29, 2013

Richard Rodgers · Waltz from ‘Carousel’ – mp3

Richard Wagner · Prelude to ‘Die Meistersinger von Nürnberg’ – mp3

Jean Sibelius · Symphony No.2 in D Major, Op.43 – mp3
